meanings.definition: The act of interrupting or causing a break in a process or activity.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, constant interruptions made it hard to focus on the discussion.
meanings.sent2: Unexpected interruptions like phone calls can disrupt your workflow.
meanings.sent3: The interruptions from the noisy construction outside turned the office into a chaotic place.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a pleasant interruption in the serious atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sudden power outage was a major interruption to our presentation.

meanings.definition: Something that interrupts or causes a break in a process or activity.
meanings.sent1: Please try to minimize interruptions during the exam so everyone can concentrate.
meanings.sent2: Technical interruptions in the live broadcast caused delays in the program.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful interruptions during the online class amused the students.
meanings.sent4: His absence felt like an interruption in the usual flow of our daily routine.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise outside was a constant interruption to their peaceful study session.
